revision.comment: Notification of altered sources needing review #IABot (v1.2.6)
revision.text: {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject College football|class=C|importance=high}} {{WikiProject Atlantic Coast Conference|class=C}} {{WikiProject United States|class=C|importance=Low|MA=yes|MA-importance=|Boston=yes|Boston-importance=}} }} == Holy War == As it is now, this section represents a disproportionate portion of the article. I suggest cleaning up this section and moving most of it to [[Holy War (Boston College vs. Notre Dame)]]. [[Special:Contributions/24.91.215.57|24.91.215.57]] ([[User talk:24.91.215.57|talk]]) 00:32, 18 February 2008 (UTC) Makes sense. [[Special:Contributions/199.117.49.194|199.117.49.194]] ([[User talk:199.117.49.194|talk]]) 16:33, 8 March 2008 (UTC) * Almost two months since I suggested merging this section with [[Holy War (Boston College vs. Notre Dame)]]. [[Special:Contributions/24.91.215.57|24.91.215.57]] ([[User talk:24.91.215.57|talk]]) 20:16, 13 April 2008 (UTC) == Frank Carney (football coach) == I have proposed merging [[Frank Carney (football coach)]] into this article. It seems that there is nothing to say about him other that he was a coach for this team, and that's not enough to justify a standalone article. --[[User:BrownHairedGirl|BrownHairedGirl]] [[User_talk:BrownHairedGirl|(talk)]] • ([[Special:Contributions/BrownHairedGirl|contribs]]) 19:30, 27 March 2008 (UTC) * That seems reasonable. [[Special:Contributions/24.91.215.57|24.91.215.57]] ([[User talk:24.91.215.57|talk]]) 20:15, 13 April 2008 (UTC) ::One would imagine that there are other things to say about him, surely, even if they have not yet been said? [[User:John Kenney|john k]] ([[User talk:John Kenney|talk]]) 15:01, 16 December 2008 (UTC) :::The article should be expanded and merged with the (as of yet uncreated) [[1896 Boston College Eagles football team]] article. ~ [[User:Psantora|Paul]][[User talk:Psantora|T]][http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=User_talk:Psantora&action=edit +]/[[Special:Contributions/Psantora|C]] 20:10, 13 January 2009 (UTC) ==Image copyright problem with Image:BostonCollegeEagles.png== The image [[:Image:BostonCollegeEagles.png]] is used in this article under a claim of [[WP:NFC|fair use]], but it does not have an adequate explanation for why it meets the [[WP:NFCC|requirements for such images]] when used here. In particular, for each page the image is used on, it must have an [[Wikipedia:Non-free use rationale guideline|explanation]] linking to that page which explains why it needs to be used on that page. Please check :* That there is a [[Wikipedia:Non-free use rationale guideline|non-free use rationale]] on the image's description page for the use in this article. :* That this article is linked to from the image description page. This is an automated notice by [[User:FairuseBot|FairuseBot]]. For assistance on the image use policy, see [[Wikipedia:Media copyright questions]]. --22:17, 16 May 2008 (UTC) ==Jeff Jags== Anyone care to update this page with some info on the new coach? == 2004, 2005, 2006 seasons == Can someone fix the issue pertaining to the 2004, 2005, and 2006 seasons? When you click on the links for those seasons, you are re-directed to the page entitled Boston College Eagles football, not the respective season's page. Thanks — Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[User:Ccbbws1999|Ccbbws1999]] ([[User talk:Ccbbws1999|talk]] • [[Special:Contributions/Ccbbws1999|contribs]]) 15:14, 18 September 2012 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just added archive links to {{plural:1|one external link|1 external links}} on [[Boston College Eagles football]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=711204824 my edit]. If necessary, add {{tlx|cbignore}} after the link to keep me from modifying it. Alternatively, you can add {{tlx|nobots|deny{{=}}InternetArchiveBot}} to keep me off the page altogether. I made the following changes: *Added archive http://web.archive.org/web/20080724120304/http://www.cfbdatawarehouse.com/data/div_ia/acc/boston_college/all_national_champs.php to http://www.cfbdatawarehouse.com/data/div_ia/acc/boston_college/all_national_champs.php When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' or '''failed''' to let others know (documentation at {{tlx|Sourcecheck}}). {{sourcecheck|checked=false}} Cheers.—[[User:Cyberbot II|cyberbot II]][[User talk:Cyberbot II|Talk to my owner]]:Online 14:03, 21 March 2016 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just modified {{plural:4|one external link|4 external links}} on [[Boston College Eagles football]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=748107267 my edit]. If you have any questions, or need the bot to ignore the links, or the page altogether, please visit [[User:Cyberpower678/FaQs#InternetArchiveBot|this simple FaQ]] for additional information. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20081208201757/http://www.ncaa.org/wps/ncaa?ContentID=40940 to http://www.ncaa.org/wps/ncaa?ContentID=40940 *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20140827100250/http://www.accessnorthga.com/detail-pf.php?n=99205 to http://www.accessnorthga.com/detail-pf.php?n=99205 *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20141025180522/http://www.csnchicago.com/notre-dame/brian-kelly-sees-payoff-notre-dames-shamrock-series to http://www.csnchicago.com/notre-dame/brian-kelly-sees-payoff-notre-dames-shamrock-series *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20081202114721/http://washingtontimes.com:80/weblogs/d1scourse/2008/Oct/29/virginia-techs-thursday-night-magic/ to http://www.washingtontimes.com/weblogs/d1scourse/2008/Oct/29/virginia-techs-thursday-night-magic When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' or '''failed''' to let others know (documentation at {{tlx|Sourcecheck}}). {{sourcecheck|checked=false}} Cheers.—[[User:InternetArchiveBot|'''InternetArchiveBot''']] ([[User talk:InternetArchiveBot|Report bug]]) 11:00, 6 November 2016 (UTC)
